categories.name: Laptops
categories.description: High-performance laptops for work and play

categories.name: Accessories
categories.description: Complete your setup with our accessories

products.name: Acme X1 Mobile Phone
products.description: A powerful smartphone with a stunning display and long battery life.
products.longDescription: The Acme X1 features a 6.5-inch AMOLED display, 128GB storage, and a 5000mAh battery. Enjoy fast performance and a premium camera experience.

products.name: Acme Mini Mobile
products.description: A compact and reliable feature phone.
products.longDescription: Perfect for calls and texts, the Acme Mini offers a long-lasting battery and simple interface for everyday use.

products.name: AcmeBook Pro 15
products.longDescription: AcmeBook Pro 15 features a 15-inch Retina display, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and a powerful processor for demanding tasks.

products.name: AcmeBook Air 13
products.description: Lightweight and portable laptop for everyday use.
products.longDescription: The AcmeBook Air 13 is perfect for students and travelers, featuring a slim design, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD.

products.name: Acme Wireless Mouse
products.description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with long battery life.
products.longDescription: Enjoy smooth and precise control with the Acme Wireless Mouse, featuring a comfortable grip and up to 12 months of battery life.

products.name: Acme Laptop Sleeve
products.description: Protective sleeve for laptops up to 15 inches.
products.longDescription: Keep your laptop safe from scratches and bumps with this stylish and durable sleeve.
